title: E-States Nepal
summary: Cross-platform real-estate application enabling property search, listing management, authentication, and API-driven interactions. Built with a modular backend and optimized Flutter UI.
process: Designed MySQL relational schema for listings, users, images, locations, and saved properties
Developed REST APIs for CRUD listings, search filters, authentication, and session management
Built Flutter UI with responsive components, paginated lists, and state management
Integrated backend API responses with caching and data validation on client side
Conducted usability testing to refine navigation, button placement, and filter clarity
Added basic analytics events (searches, favorites) for future insights
impact: Enabled transparent property discovery without broker dependency
Demonstrated ability to design mobile interfaces and backend data flows
Improved UX with fast search, intuitive filters, and smooth navigation
Showcased strong API design, SQL modeling, and client-server integration
